Ann,
 
I believe that spirits that are  earthbound are aware of what we in=
 the physical are doing in the field of paranormal research 
and I also bel=
ieve that these earthbound as well as celestial spirits pay close attention=
 given the attractive energy vibrations 
we must normaly develop while delv=
ing into the paranormal and coming into contact with spirit entities. I thi=
nk they would attempt to communicate
with us using words and phrases that a=
re familiar to us.and that we will understand.
 
those are my thoughts on t=
hat question.
 
Bruce
 
Bruce Halliday 


To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.comFrom: =
lisby@...: Fri, 8 Feb 2008 16:11:43 +0000Subject: [EVP-ITC] R=
e: New file uploaded to EVP-ITC




You know, now that I read your reply, i=
t occurs to me that what I'mreally wondering about is that the spirit used =
the word "grounded."That's our lingo--not what an average dead person would=
 reply, I don'tthink. Had you mentioned the term aloud? I'm just curious ab=
out theword choice. It strikes me more as a deliberate choice made by anent=
ity familiar with paranormal jargon.Thoughts?Ann--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.=
com, bruce halliday<paranormalinvestigating@...> wrote:>> > No context, I f=

x session kind of like a moth is drawn to a light.> > I believe the energy =
